    <item>

	<title><![CDATA[A royal faux pas at Queen Elizabeth’s  garden party]]></title>

        <media:title>Queen Elizabeth mingles with guests attending a garden party in the grounds of Buckingham Palace: the queen was caught on camera saying  that Chinese officials  who visited last year had been “very rude” to the British ambassador. Photograph: Leon Neal/AFP/Getty Images</media:title>

    <item>
	<title><![CDATA[Judge refuses care order for child despite alleged sexual abuse ]]></title>
	<link>http://www.irishtimes.com/news/crime-and-law/courts/district-court/judge-refuses-care-order-for-child-despite-alleged-sexual-abuse-1.2645783?localLinksEnabled=false</link>

    <item>
	<title><![CDATA[Easily confused Irish struggle to spot bargains, ESRI finds]]></title>
	<link>http://www.irishtimes.com/news/consumer/easily-confused-irish-struggle-to-spot-bargains-esri-finds-1.2645954?localLinksEnabled=false</link>
	<description><![CDATA[Extra information about products, beyond price, makes people struggle to see value   ]]></description>
	<dc:creator>Conor Pope</dc:creator>
	<dc:subject>Consumer</dc:subject>
	<guid isPermaLink="false">1.2645954</guid>
	<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		                              
                                <media:content url="http://www.irishtimes.com/polopoly_fs/1.2645950.1463122332!/image/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_940/image.jpg" medium="image" type="image/jpeg">
        <media:title>The study shows that when a single additional factor, alongside price, is used to describe two comparable products, consumers struggle to identify which is the best value for money. File photograph: Frank Miller/The Irish Times</media:title>
        </media:content>
                </item>

    <item>
	<title><![CDATA[Donald Trump moves to hurt Clinton’s support among women]]></title>
	<link>http://www.irishtimes.com/news/world/us/donald-trump-moves-to-hurt-clinton-s-support-among-women-1.2645827?localLinksEnabled=false</link>
	<description><![CDATA[It is a risky strategy for the New York billionaire, given his low standing among women   ]]></description>
	<dc:creator>Simon Carswell</dc:creator>
	<dc:subject>US</dc:subject>
	<guid isPermaLink="false">1.2645827</guid>
	<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:13:37 +0000</pubDate>
		                              
                                <media:content url="http://www.irishtimes.com/polopoly_fs/1.2645825.1463120191!/image/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_940/image.jpg" medium="image" type="image/jpeg">
        <media:title>Supporters hold signs, hours before Donald Trump’s campaign rally at the Northwest Washington Fairgrounds in Lynden, Washington, last weekend: the businessman has a massive negative rating among women. Photograph: David Ryder/The New York Times</media:title>
        </media:content>
                </item>
